data.documents_details:
Job Holder:
  • New and Old Passport bio page(1st page) color scan copy
  • Previous visited visa color scan copies - Any country
  • Commitment letter of return
  • Recent photographs taken in the last 3 months (passport size, white background soft copy).
  • Visiting Card - color scan
  • Employee ID card copy - color scan
  • No objection certificate (NOC) - color scan
  • Marriage certificate copy ( if spouse's name is not mentioned in the Passport )
  • A security deposit of BDT 120,000/- per person is required depending on the applicant's profile and travel history


Businessman:
  • New and Old Passport bio page(1st page) color scan copy
  • Renewal trade license copy with notary public (English translated)
  • Previous visited visa color scan copies - Any country
  • Commitment letter of return
  • Marriage certificate copy ( if spouse's name is not mentioned in the Passport )
  • Recent photographs taken in the last 3 months (passport size, white background soft copy).
  • Visiting Card - color scan
  • Company letter head pad
  • Employee ID card copy - color scan
  • A security deposit of BDT 120,000/- per person is required depending on the applicant's profile and travel histor

Doctor:
  • New and Old Passport bio page(1st page) color scan copy
  • Previous visited visa color scan copies - Any country
  • Commitment letter of return
  • Marriage certificate copy ( if spouse's name is not mentioned in the Passport )
  • Recent photographs taken in the last 3 months (passport size, white background soft copy).
  • Visiting Card - color scan
  • BMDC certificate for doctor (Scan copy)
  • A security deposit of BDT 120,000/- per person is required depending on the applicant's profile and travel history

Advocate -- Lawyer:
  • New and Old Passport bio page(1st page) color scan copy
  • Previous visited visa color scan copies - Any country
  • Commitment letter of return
  • Marriage certificate copy ( if spouse's name is not mentioned in the Passport )
  • BAR Council certificate for Advocate  - color scan
  • Recent photographs taken in the last 3 months (passport size, white background soft copy).
  • Visiting Card - color scan
  • Employee ID card copy - color scan
  • A security deposit of BDT 120,000/- per person is required depending on the applicant's profile and travel history

Student:
  • New and Old Passport bio page(1st page) color scan copy
  • Previous visited visa color scan copies - Any country
  • Commitment letter of return
  • Recent photographs taken in the last 3 months (passport size, white background soft copy).
  • Student ID card Photo Copy - color scan (not with mobile photography)
  • Birth Certificate Mandatory for Child (below 18 yrs)
  • Birth certificate (Only for Child & infant) - color scan copy (not with mobile photography)
  • A security deposit of BDT 120,000/- per person is required depending on the applicant's profile and travel history


Important Notes

Please contact the Visa department for Document processing after the payment. Visa rate may change without any prior notice

Job Holder:
  • 07 Months Valid Passport With Old Passport (If have)
  • No objection certificate (NOC)
  • Marriage certificate copy (if spouse name not mentioned in the passport)
  • Employee Id card copy (One photo copy)
  • Recent 2 copy photograph taken in last 3 months (white background only, photo size 35 mm X 50 mm, Matt paper).
  • Personal bank solvency certificate
  • Visiting Card
  • Personal or Company bank statement of last 06 months and minimum balance BDT 80,000 for each applicant
Businessman:
  • 07 Months Valid Passport With Old Passport (If have)
  • Renewal trade license copy with notary public (english translated)
  • Marriage certificate copy (if spouse name not mentioned in the passport)
  • Memorandum for limited company form page XII (One photo copy)
  • Recent 2 copy photograph taken in last 3 months (white background only, photo size 35 mm X 50 mm, Matt paper).
  • Company letter head pad
  • Personal or company bank solvency certificate
  • Visiting Card
  • Personal or Company bank statement of last 06 months and minimum balance BDT 80,000 for each applicant
Govt Job Holder:
  • 07 Months Valid Passport With Old Passport (If have)
  • Marriage certificate copy (if spouse name not mentioned in the passport)
  • Employee Id card copy (One photo copy)
  • Recent 2 copy photograph taken in last 3 months (white background only, photo size 35 mm X 50 mm, Matt paper).
  • Personal bank solvency certificate
  • GO (Government order) for official passport
  • Visiting Card
  • Personal or Company bank statement of last 06 months and minimum balance BDT 80,000 for each applicant

  • Company letter head pad

  • 07 Months Valid Passport With Old Passport (If have)

  • Marriage certificate copy (if spouse name not mentioned in the passport)
  • Employee Id card copy (One photo copy)
  • Recent 2 copy photograph taken in last 3 months (white background only, photo size 35 mm X 50 mm, Matt paper).
  • Personal bank solvency certificate
  • Visiting Card
  • Personal or Company bank statement of last 06 months and minimum balance BDT 80,000 for each applicant
Student:
  • 07 Months Valid Passport With Old Passport (If have)
  • ID card (Student) one photocopy both sides
  • NOC (Student) original copy
  • Recent 2 copy photograph taken in last 3 months (white background only, photo size 35 mm X 50 mm, Matt paper).
  • Personal bank solvency certificate
  • Personal or Company bank statement of last 06 months and minimum balance BDT 80,000 for each applicant

  • 07 Months Valid Passport With Old Passport (If have)
  • Recent 2 copy photograph taken in last 3 months (white background only, photo size 35 mm X 50 mm, Matt paper).
  • Personal bank solvency certificate
  • Birth certificate
  • Personal or Company bank statement of last 06 months and minimum balance BDT 80,000 for each applicant

  • 07 Months Valid Passport With Old Passport (If have)

  • Recent 2 copy photograph taken in last 3 months (white background only, photo size 35 mm X 50 mm, Matt paper).
  • Personal bank solvency certificate
  • NID or birth certificate (must) one photo copy
  • Personal or Company bank statement of last 06 months and minimum balance BDT 80,000 for each applicant

  • Personal bank solvency certificate
  • NID or birth certificate (must) one photo copy
  • Personal or Company bank statement of last 06 months and minimum balance BDT 80,000 for each applicant
